page.title: 06A QUEENBOROUGH WEDDING
page.content: On Saturday my Auntie got married in Queenborough Church. I was a bridesmaid and my brother was a page boy. I had a lilac dress, lilac head-dress and a pink and white bouquet. My brother wore black and white. My auntie wore a white wedding dress. My nan wore lilac, beige and grey. My mum wore red and khaki. After the wedding we went to Abbott's Club. The best man made a speech and so did my uncle and my grandad. Later on in the evening more people came and then I went round with trays of wedding cake. Then there was dancing for the rest of the evening. My mum stayed wuth some other people to clear up.
